WorkItem.Description:
See the attached file [rawr.zip].
 
A couple of ilvl 333 helms appear to be better than some other ilvl 346 helms [sshot01.jpg]. Included as well is the exported character file [char.xml], Bear model.
 
edit: I should also mention, I have already tried to reset the item cache as well as all caches. I have also tried to refresh the items in question from wowhead. Neither of these fixed the issue.
WorkItem.Summary: [Bear] ilvl 333 items shown to be better than ilvl 346

Comments.Message: Sorry, what's the issue? You say that some ilvl 333 items are showing up as better than some other ilvl 346 items. That's not a bug.

My apologies. Given the direct correlation between ilvl and armour/agi/sta and the fact that secondary stats are comparatively worthless for Bears, I thought it would naturally follow that no agi based ilvl 346 item should be worse than an agi based ilvl 333 item.

In having said that, my mistake was a blindingly obvious one to have run into. I've been tinkering with it for some time now and just realized it was due to meta-gem requirements. Both 333 helms which appeared better had yellow sockets which fulfilled the meta-gem requirements, whereas the 346 helms both had blue sockets.
